MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Main Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:40pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:53 PM on Sunday, 14 February 2021.
